pages.text: $(li)The Piston is a block that is capable of pushing blocks and creatures.$(br)$(li)It will be turned on when receives a redstone pulse.

$(li)This item can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/hats/hat_launcher)Hat Launcher$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/sticky_piston)$(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/sticky_piston)Sticky Piston$(/l)$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).
